name: Conifer Wurm
originalText:
Trample
{3}{G}: Conifer Wurm gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of snow permanents you control.

rulings.text: The value of X is determined only as Conifer Wurm’s ability begins to resolve. It won’t change later in the turn if the number of snow permanents you control changes.
Because Conifer Wurm is itself a snow permanent, its ability will usually give it at least +1/+1.

text:
